chapter.title: Getting Started
chapter.para: To get started, you create a root database and a client database that each run the SymmetricDS software to synchronize changes. You open registration for the client, which registers with the root to receive the synchronization configuration. You ask the root to reload the client in order to perform an initial synchronization. Then you make changes to each database and observe the changes propagating.

section.title: Creating and Populating Your Databases
section.para: Create new databases for the root and client nodes:
Load the root node database with an initial set of test data and the synchronization configuration.
The client node database will be initialized and loaded after it registers with the root node.
